biotools.summary: TagCleaner can be used to automatically detect and efficiently remove tag sequences (e.g. WTA or MID tags) from metagenomic datasets. TagCleaner is available as both standalone and web-based versions.

bioschemas.name: TagCleaner
bioschemas.summary: TagCleaner can be used to automatically detect and efficiently remove tag sequences (e.g. WTA or MID tags) from metagenomic datasets. TagCleaner is available as both standalone and web-based versions.
